channel.title: Elizabeth Morran: Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Elizabeth Morran: Portfolio

item.title: justGO: The carpool app for seniors
item.description: A carpooling app allowing seniors to get affordable rides to local events.

item.title: Starbucks Candygram App
item.description: A fun holiday app to send a Candygram Latte to your friend.

item.title: 6 Crazy Superstitions From Around the World
item.description: A short, quirky video highlighting local superstitions in various countries.

item.title: 10 Early Childhood Behavior Management Strategies
item.description: A guide to useful strategies for managing behavior at the daycare center.

item.title: 4 Harmful Cat Myths We Need to Put To Rest
item.description: Scientifically debunks common myths about cats to promote better human-feline relations.

item.title: 6 Crazy Superstitions From Around the World
item.description: Objective: Create a short “viral video” based on one of the most common viral formats. My role: Director, scenario writer, editor, actor. Duration: 1 semester (3 months). Tools used: Sony digital video camera, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Illustrator. Skills used: Writing, storyboarding, visual storytelling, video directing, video editing. Every country and culture has its own quirky beliefs. Many Canadians fear the number 13, and in China it’s taboo to give a clock as a gift.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My aim as a writer is to integrate purpose and insight, illuminating the “what” for the sake of the “why.” In my year as a UX Content Strategist, I’ve leveraged my background in cognitive science to develop user-centric digital content that simplifies complex processes and provides relevant, actionable information. With a keen eye for clarity and structure, and five years of professional writing experience, I develop effective UI and navigational microcopy, concise and helpful support resources, penetrating user research prompts and persuasive marketing copy.

item.title: Are Cats Antisocial? The Science of Purrfect Feline Relations
item.description: This piece explores the science behind how cats socialize, both with other cats and with humans.

item.title: Delisted Providers in Search
item.description: An update to our mobile provider search, adding a filter for delisted providers.

item.title: Microcopy samples
item.description: Examples of microcopy I’ve written at Medavie Blue Cross.

item.title: Abandoned Cart Emails
item.description: Objective: Create a series of re-engagement emails for abandoned checkouts. My role: Designer, copywriter. Duration: 3 weeks. Tools used: HTML, CSS, Jinja templating language, Canva. Skills used: Email copywriting, email design, image editing. Email 1 (Click to expand.) Email 2 (Click to expand.) Email 3 (Click to expand.)

item.title: Is it time for an upgrade? Your guide to whether you need a new iPhone (or just a repair)
item.description: This SEO-friendly blog post served as an inbound marketing tool, a booster to our brand image of tech-savvy smartphone experts, and a helpful resource for our customer service reps.
